name: easyreplication
tag_list: dvd, cd, bluray, cd-replication, dvd-replication, bluray-replication, duplication, manufacturing, sd-cards, promotional-usb-memory-sticks, cd-business-cards, dvd-business-cards, shaped-cd-cards, shaped-dvd-cards
overview:
easyreplication is a UK based company offering high quality DVD CD & BluRay replication and manufacturing services with delivery throughout the UK, Eire and Europe, producing replicated optical media discs at very competitive industry prices.

bulk volume of SD cards, promotional USB memory sticks are also produced allowing customers different options to market their products.

easyreplication specialises in dealing with video production companies, film production companies, software houses and marketing companies.

they have many varied and wide ranged CD and DVD media, from the standard 8 and 12cm discs to rectangular ‘cards’ to the ultimate company marketing ‘tool’ the bespoke ‘shaped’ CD or DVD disc.
